entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
